title: Ulta Beauty: Tariff-driven price increases accelerated in Q3
description: Despite higher prices from brands and a “softening” in consumer confidence, the retailer's third quarter net sales jumped nearly 13%.
content:
Dive Brief:
<ul><li>Ulta Beautys third quarter net sales grew 12.9% year over year to $2.9 billion, helped along by comp growth, new stores and the July acquisition of Space NK. Comparable sales jum… [+2565 chars]
